meanings.definition: To put or place back into something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully reinserts the key into the lock.
meanings.sent2: He always reinserts the bookmark in his favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful squirrel reinserts the acorn in the wrong hole.
meanings.sent4: The detective reinserts the missing piece into the puzzle of the case.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic skillfully reinserts the spark plug into the engine.

meanings.sent1: After the error, she reinserts the USB drive to save the file.
meanings.sent2: He reinserts the batteries in the remote control to make it work.
meanings.sent3: The magician reinserts the rabbit into the hat for another trick.
meanings.sent4: The writer reinserts the deleted paragraph to improve the story.
meanings.sent5: The doctor reinserts the needle gently to avoid causing pain.
